summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1145, for the improvement of Thirty-seventh Avenue from a point fifty (50) feet north of the north line of East Spring Street to the north line of Rosedale Addition, by constructing concrete sidewalks, wooden curbs, gutters, cross walks and other appurtenances therein, under Ordinance No. 12912 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
